mapper.sql: id, contract_code, contract_type_code,contract_state, customerId, customerName, contract_obj, paper_contract_no, start_date, expire_date, description, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from price_contract_info where 1=1
order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into price_contract_info(contract_code, contract_type_code, contract_state, customerId, customerName, contract_obj, paper_contract_no, start_date, expire_date, description, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag) values ( #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperContractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into price_contract_item(contract_code, biz_type_code, subject_id, template_id, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag) values ( #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT e.template_type_code transportCode,e.template_name transportName,e.remark transportRemark, d.storage_template_type storageCode,d.template_name storageName,c.remark generalStorageRemark,d.remark storageRemark, f.template_name dispatchName,f.remark dispatchRemark,a.template_id,a.subject_id subjectId from price_contract_item a LEFT JOIN price_general_quotation c ON a.template_id=c.quotation_no LEFT JOIN price_general_template d ON a.template_id=d.template_code left JOIN price_transport_template e on a.template_id=e.template_code LEFT JOIN price_dispatch_template f ON a.template_id=f.template_code where a.contract_code=#{contractId} and a.del_flag='0'
select subject_id subjectId,template_code templateId from price_contract_discount_item where contract_code=#{contractId} and del_flag='0'

select contract_code,contract_type_code,customerId,customerName,contract_obj,paper_contract_no,del_flag from price_contract_info where del_flag = 0 and start_date < current_timestamp() and expire_date >= current_timestamp() and customerid=#{customerid} and contract_type_code=#{contractTypeCode} and contract_state='1' limit 1

select a.customerId,a.customerName,a.abnormalType,a.remark from (SELECT customerId,customerName,'WILLBEEXPIRE' as abnormalType,CONCAT('生效日期为',start_date,',失效日期为',expire_date) as remark from price_contract_info where (to_days(expire_date)-to_days(now()))<#{time} and expire_date>now()) a UNION ALL select c.customerId,c.customerName,c.abnormalType,c.remark from (SELECT customerId,customerName,'NOTCONFIGPRICE' as abnormalType,'' as remark from price_contract_info where contract_code in (select contract_code from price_contract_info where del_flag='0' and contract_code not in(select DISTINCT(contract_code) from price_contract_item where del_flag='0'))) c UNION ALL select b.customerId,b.customerName,b.abnormalType,b.remark from (SELECT customerId,customerName,'NOTCONFIGRULE' as abnormalType,'' as remark from price_contract_info where customerId in ( select d.customerId from (SELECT customerId from price_contract_info where customerId in (select customerId from price_contract_info where del_flag='0' and customerId not in(select DISTINCT(customerid) from pub_rule_customer_receivable where del_flag='0' and customerid is not null))) d where d.customerId not in(SELECT customerId from price_contract_info where contract_code in (select contract_code from price_contract_info where del_flag='0' and contract_code not in(select DISTINCT(contract_code) from price_contract_item where del_flag='0')) )) ) b
select DISTINCT(customerid) from price_contract_info where del_flag='0'

select DISTINCT b.biz_type_code as bizTypeCode,c.code_name as bizTypeName from price_contract_info a inner join price_contract_discount_item b on a.contract_code = b.contract_code inner join system_code c on b.biz_type_code = c.`code` where a.customerId = #{customerId}

select DISTINCT b.subject_id as subjectId,c.extattr1 as carrierId,c.code_name as carrierName from price_contract_info a inner join price_contract_discount_item b on a.contract_code = b.contract_code inner join system_code c on b.subject_id = c.`code` where a.customerId = #{customerId} and b.biz_type_code = #{bizTypeCode} and a.contract_state='1' and a.contract_type_code='CUSTOMER_CONTRACT' and b.del_flag=0;
select * from price_contract_item WHERE subject_id=#{subjectId} and contract_code=#{contractCode}
